casebody.data:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Timothy W. SIMMONS, Defendant-Petitioner. C-1015 September Term 2017
080688 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 6, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000249-17 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted and the matter is summarily remanded to the sentencing court to provide a statement of reasons for the imposition of the mandatory minimum sentence. Jurisdiction is not retained.
